name: TINTU GM
ideal_referral: 1. Architects 2. Engineers 3. MEP consultants 4. Electrical Contractors 5. Builders 6. Contractors 7. Interior Designers 8. Furnishing studios 9. Institution’s 10. Private and Government sectors
my_favourite_bni_story: Starting a new company after leaving my previous partnership was one of the biggest challenges I’ve faced. But what made the journey smoother was the incredible support from my BNI family. From setting up office space to company registration, purchasing hardware, and creating a website, my BNI friends were there every step of the way. They also helped me with digital marketing and connected me with professionals who guided and supported me. More than just business, BNI gave me a community of friends who believed in me and encouraged me during tough times. Their actions truly embody the “Givers Gain” philosophy. Today, I’m proud of what I’ve achieved, and I know I couldn’t have done it without the amazing people in my BNI chapter. Thank you for being my backbone and helping me rebuild and thrive. If you’re wondering whether BNI is worth it, let me tell you—it’s more than networking; it’s a family that uplifts each other. Here’s to new beginnings and the power of collaboration!
